mapper.select: SELECT review_id AS reviewId, product_name AS productName, rating, review_title AS reviewTitle, review_content AS reviewContent, review_date AS reviewDate, review_image As reviewImg FROM review r LEFT JOIN product p ON r.product_id = p.product_id WHERE USER_NO=#{userNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE review SET RATING=#{rating}, REVIEW_TITLE=#{reviewTitle}, REVIEW_CONTENT=#{reviewContent}, REVIEW_DATE=now(), REVIEW_IMAGE=#{reviewImg} WHERE PRODUCT_ID = #{productId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review( REVIEW_ID, PRODUCT_ID, USER_NO, RATING, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_DATE, REVIEW_IMAGE) VALUES( (SELECT MAX(a.REVIEW_ID)+1 FROM review a), #{productId}, #{userNo}, #{rating}, #{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, now(), #{reviewImg})
